      • fromResponse

        public abstract Scan fromResponse​(java.util.ArrayList<Response> fromMicroscope)
        Picks out and formats the data back from the microscope into a Scan object so that it may be processed.
        Parameters:
        fromMicroscope - The raw data returned by the request, to be processed.
        Returns:
        A Scan object which may be displayed and/or processed further
